title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The localization key field is left blank when adding the externalized text to the chart.
EB: The localization key field should not be allowed to be blank when adding the externalized text to the chart.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Attempt to add the externalized text to the chart without providing a localization key.
